en: And I lifted up mine eyes, and saw, and, behold, a man with a measuring line in his hand.
hmr: Chun, ka mithai chu ka hang inlên a, ka en a, mi a kuta inkhina hmawl chawi hi ka hmuh a.

en: Then said I, Whither goest thou? And he said unto me, To measure Jerusalem, to see what is the breadth thereof, and what is the length thereof.
hmr: Chun, keiin, “Khawtienga fe ding am i na?” ka ta. Ama chun ka kuom- ah, “Jerusalem chu inkhi dingin, a khang chu ieng ruol am a na, a dungtieng ieng chen am a na ti hre dingin,” a ta.

en: And, behold, the angel that talked with me went forth, and another angel went out to meet him,
hmr: Chun, ngai ta, vântirko a mi betu chu a fe suok tah a, chun, vântirko dangin ama chu ân tuokpui a, a kuomah,

en: and said unto him, Run, speak to this young man, saying, Jerusalem shall be inhabited as villages without walls, by reason of the multitude of men and cattle therein.
hmr: “Tlân la, hi tlangvâl kuoma hin, ‘mipui tam lei le ranruol leiin Jerusalem chu khuohai kulhai um lo anga hluo el nîng a tih,’ tiin hril rawh.

en: For I, saith Jehovah, will be unto her a wall of fire round about, and I will be the glory in the midst of her.
hmr: A vêlin kei a mei kul bang nîng ka ta, a sûnga chun kei chu a ropuina ka ni ding a ni sih a, LALPA chun a tih,” a ta.

en: Ho, ho, flee from the land of the north, saith Jehovah; for I have spread you abroad as the four winds of the heavens, saith Jehovah.
hmr: “Hung ro, hung ro, hmâr rama inthawk dâm chun hung tlân suok ro, LALPA chun a tih: vân kil liahai chena chun ka lo sukdar ta si cheu a, LALPA chun a tih.

en: Ho Zion, escape, thou that dwellest with the daughter of Babylon.
hmr: Babulon naunu le chêng hmun- khat Zion, hung la, hung suok rawh.

en: For thus saith Jehovah of hosts: After glory hath he sent me unto the nations which plundered you; for he that toucheth you toucheth the apple of his eye.
hmr: LALPA chun hieng hin a ti sih a: A ropuina ding ang peiin ama chun nangni suksetu cheu hnamhai kuom- a chun a mi tir a; nangni tâwktu cheu chun ama mit nautê a tâwk a ni sih a:

en: For, behold, I will shake my hand over them, and they shall be a spoil to those that served them; and ye shall know that Jehovah of hosts hath sent me.
hmr: Ngai ta u, anni chunga chun ka kut chu thin ka ta, chuongchun, anni rawng bâwlpêktuhai ta dingin râllâk sum hung ni tâng an tih; chun, sipaihai LALPA chun kei a mi tir a nih ti hre tâng in tih.

en: Sing and rejoice, O daughter of Zion; for, lo, I come, and I will dwell in the midst of thee, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Aw Zion naunu, hlim la, hla sak rawh, en ta, ka hung mêk a, nangni lai chun ka chêng ding a ni sih a, LALPA chun a tih.

en: And many nations shall join themselves to Jehovah in that day, and shall be my people; and I will dwell in the midst of thee, and thou shalt know that Jehovah of hosts hath sent me unto thee.
hmr: Chun, chu nia chun hnam tamtakhai chu LALPA tieng hung kawp an ta, ka mihai an hung ni ding a nih; chun, kei chu nangmaa chun chêng ka ta, chuongchun, sipaihai LALPA chun i kuomah a mi hung tir a nih ti hre tâng i tih.

en: And Jehovah shall inherit Judah as his portion in the holy land, and shall yet choose Jerusalem.
hmr: Chun, ram inthienga chun LALPA chun a chanpuol dingin Juda chu hluong a ta, Jerusalem chu thlang tâng a tih.”

en: Be silent, all flesh, before Jehovah; for he is waked up out of his holy habitation.
hmr: Mi po pohai, LALPA hmaa chun to ṭhiep ro khai: a chêngna inthienga inthawk chun a hung thohar ta sih a.
